subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
Variant of {{m|mul|眾}}, with bottom component ⿲{{l|mul|[[人]][[亻]][[人]]}} replaced by {{m|mul|乑}} (similar to unrelated {{m|mul|衣}} and {{m|mul|𠂢}}).

Current form is graphically {{Han compound|血|乑|t2=crowd, multitude}} – bottom is originally 3 people, hence “crowd”, though top is unrelated to 血, being originally {{m|mul|[[目|罒]]||eye|sc=Hani}}.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{w|Kangxi dictionary}} lists 衆 as the [[unorthodox]] form ([[俗字]]) of {{l|mul|眾}}. However, 衆 is the preferred form used in Japanese {{w|kanji}}.

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=6|rs=血06}} <!-- No kyūjitai form. Not a shinjitai character -->
